content.name: Population
content.desc: People, their living arrangements and where they come from.

variables.name: Household deprivation
variables.desc: If a household is deprived, based on employment, education, health and disability, and overcrowding.

categories.name: Household is not deprived in any dimension
Household is deprived in one dimension
Household is deprived in two dimensions
Household is deprived in three dimensions
Household is deprived in four dimensions

variables.name: Household composition
variables.desc: Households according to the relationships between members.

categories.name: One person household: Aged 66 years and over
categories.legend_str_3: households with one person aged 66 years and over

categories.name: One person household: Other
categories.legend_str_3: househols with one person aged less than 66 years

categories.name: Single family household: All aged 66 years and over
categories.legend_str_3: single family households in which all people are aged 66 years and over

categories.name: Single family household: Married or civil partnership couple: No children
categories.legend_str_3: single family households of a married or civil partnership couple with no children

categories.name: Single family household: Married or civil partnership couple: Dependent children
categories.legend_str_3: single family households of a married or civil partnership couple with dependent children

categories.name: Single family household: Married or civil partnership couple: All children non-dependent
categories.legend_str_3: single family households of a married or civil partnership couple with all children non-dependent

categories.name: Single family household: Cohabiting couple family: No children
categories.legend_str_3: single family households of a cohabiting couple family with no children

categories.name: Single family household: Cohabiting couple family: With dependent children
categories.legend_str_3: single family households of a cohabiting couple family with dependent children

categories.name: Single family household: Cohabiting couple family: All children non-dependent
categories.legend_str_3: single family households of a cohabiting couple family with all children non-dependent

categories.name: Single family household: Lone parent family: With dependent children
categories.legend_str_3: single family households of a lone parent family with dependent children

categories.name: Single family household: Lone parent family: All children non-dependent
categories.legend_str_3: single family households of a lone parent family with all children non-dependent

categories.name: Single family household: Other single family household: Other family composition
categories.legend_str_3: single family households with other family composition

categories.name: Multiple-family household: Other, including all full-time students and all aged 66 years and over
categories.legend_str_3: multiple-family households with other composition, including all full-time students and all aged 66 years and over

variables.name: Multiple ethnic groups in household
variables.desc: Single or multiple ethnic groups within the household, and whether ethnic groups differ between generations or partnerships within the household.

classifications.desc: Multiple ethnic groups in household (6 categories)

categories.name: All household members have the same ethnic group
categories.legend_str_3: members that all have the same ethnic group

categories.name: Ethnic groups differ between generations but not within partnerships
categories.legend_str_3: members from ethnic groups that differ between generations but not within partnerships

categories.name: Ethnic groups differ within partnerships
categories.legend_str_3: members from ethnic groups that differ within partnerships

categories.name: Any other combination of multiple ethnic identities
categories.legend_str_3: members with any other combination of multiple ethnic identities

variables.name: Marital and civil partnership status
variables.desc: Classifies a person according to their legal marital or registered civil partnership status on 21 March 2021.

classifications.desc: Marital and civil partnership status (3 categories)

categories.name: Married or in a registered civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: married or in a registered civil partnership

categories.name: Other marital or civil partnership status
categories.legend_str_3: other marital or civil partnership status

classifications.desc: Marital and civil partnership status (6 categories)

categories.name: Never married and never registered a civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: never married and never registered a civil partnership

categories.name: Married or in a registered civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: married or in a registered civil partnership

categories.name: Separated, but still legally married or still legally in a civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: separated, but still legally married or still legally in a civil partnership

categories.name: Divorced or civil partnership dissolved
categories.legend_str_3: divorced or have had their civil partnership dissolved

categories.name: Widowed or surviving civil partnership partner
categories.legend_str_3: widowed or the surviving civil partnership partner

classifications.desc: Marital and civil partnership status (12 categories)

categories.name: Never married and never registered a civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: never married and never registered a civil partnership

categories.name: In a registered civil partnership: Opposite sex
categories.legend_str_3: in a registered civil partnership with the opposite sex

categories.name: In a registered civil partnership: Same sex
categories.legend_str_3: in a registered civil partnership with the same sex

categories.name: Separated, but still in a registered civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: separated, but still in a registered civil partnership

categories.name: Formerly in a civil partnership now legally dissolved
categories.legend_str_3: formerly in a civil partnership now legally dissolved

categories.name: Surviving partner from civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: the surviving partner from civil partnership

variables.name: Living arrangements
variables.desc: If a person is living in a couple or not, by their legal partnership status.

categories.name: Living in an opposite-sex couple: Married or in a civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: living in an opposite-sex couple that is married or in a civil partnership

categories.name: Living in a same-sex couple: Married or in a civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: living in a same-sex couple that is married or in a civil partnership

categories.name: Living in a couple: Separated, but still married or in a civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: living in a couple that is separated, but still married or in a civil partnership

categories.name: Living in an opposite-sex couple: Cohabiting
categories.legend_str_3: living in an opposite-sex couple that is cohabiting

categories.name: Living in a same-sex couple: Cohabiting
categories.legend_str_3: living in a same-sex couple that is cohabiting

categories.name: Not living in a couple: Single (never married and never registered a same-sex civil partnership)
categories.legend_str_3: single (never married and never registered a same-sex civil partnership)

categories.name: Not living in a couple: Married or in a registered civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: not living in a couple, but married or in a registered civil partnership

categories.name: Not living in a couple: Separated (including those who are married and those who are in civil partnerships)
categories.legend_str_3: separated (including those who are married and those who are in civil partnerships)

categories.name: Not living in a couple: Divorced or formerly in a civil partnership which is now legally dissolved
categories.legend_str_3: divorced or formerly in a civil partnership which is now legally dissolved

categories.name: Not living in a couple: Widowed or surviving partner from a civil partnership
categories.legend_str_3: widowed or surviving partner from a civil partnership

variables.name: Number of cars or vans
variables.desc: The number of cars or vans owned or available for use by household members.

categories.name: No cars or vans in household
categories.legend_str_3: no cars or vans in household

categories.name: 1 or more cars or vans in household
categories.legend_str_3: 1 or more cars or vans in household

categories.name: No cars or vans in household
categories.legend_str_3: no cars or vans in household

categories.name: 3 or more cars or vans in household
categories.legend_str_3: 3 or more cars or vans in household

variables.name: Age
variables.desc: A persons age on Census Day, 21 March 2021 in England and Wales. Infants aged under 1 year are classified as 0 years of age

variables.name: Sex
variables.desc: This is the sex recorded by the person completing the census. The options were Female and Male.

variables.name: Usual resident indicator
variables.desc: Identifies if a person usually lives in England or Wales.
